subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: With Rutgers leading Buffalo, 21-0, after the first quarter, the question for the crowd of 43,091 Thursday became which Scarlet Knights player would wow the fans more.
snippet: With Rutgers leading Buffalo, 21-0, after the first quarter, the question for the crowd of 43,091 Thursday became which Scarlet Knights player would wow the fans more.
